response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value to us, but its potential to transform your business or personal endeavors is unparalleled. We believe it's worth more than what we initially thought, and we're excited to offer it to you at a special price of $1,100,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its true worth of $1,200,000, and we hope this reflects our confidence in its ability to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. We look forward to discussing how this product can benefit you further. Please let us know if you have any questions or require additional information.", "product_price": 1100000}
